name: The 4th door
description:
Can you reach your home? or are you going to forever be in a loop of fighting and  dying and running out of fuel?!

controls:

Arrows  to move and space to shoot

Alt+f4 to close the game

Team members

Mohamed Mahgoub, programming

Apollyon, art

Backo, music and sfx

Gazawe,  main story idea

TIP!

Sometimes the way to win is to make your own way and not follow some NPC
